document_data.name: Capybara
document_data.genrefs: {{Cite dragon/119/The Dragon's Bestiary: A walk through the woods|47}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Capybaras''' were large rodents found in [[Maztica]]n swamps and jungles.
document_data.Abilities: Although slow and lumbering on land, capybaras were relatively fast swimmers, and could hold their breath underwater for up to eight minutes.
document_data.Ecology:
Capybaras lived in close proximity to ponds, lakes, rivers, streams, marshes, or swamps, and typically didn't stray over {{SI|100|yard|long=yes}} away from a body of water.

While groups of up to eight were most common, some capybaras traveled in herds of over 50.

[[Tabaxi]] hunted capybaras for food.
